parameter.value: Hello {|PLAYERNAME|}. I am in charge of delivering task to the players. Would you like to do a task {normal}, task {daily} and we also have some task {special}, {receive} your price for a task or {abandon} a task? You can also see a {lists of normal task}, {lists of daily task} and {lists of special task}, and more the more advanced lists are {lists of normal intermediary task} or {lists of normal superior task}.
